full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Proposal (RFP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)

#### Tender Reference Number

* Tender Title: Database Information Management (DIM)
* Reference Number: WS3906449900
* Amendment Number: 5
* Publication Date: 2023-03-10
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-25 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-04-11

#### Background

The Department of Citizenship and Immigration (IRCC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) method. The objective of this RFP is to procure TBIPS SA holders proficient in Informatics professional services to provide support for the IRCC portfolio.

#### Tender Description

The successful bidder will provide TBIPS services to support the IRCC Portfolio, including systems and legacy systems of the Passport Program. A total of 2 contracts will be awarded, each for 2 years, with 3 one-year options to extend the term.

#### Eligibility Criteria

To be eligible to participate, bidders must hold a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of the bid closing, in all required resource categories for this solicitation in the National Capital Region (NCR) under the EN578-170432 series of SAs.

#### Tender Process

RFP documents are available on the Ariba Discovery portal. The bid deadline has been revised to April 25th, 2023 at 14:00 PM EDT. Only complete bids submitted by the revised deadline will be accepted. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

#### Notice URL

To access the RFP notice, please click on the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15663098?extsite=MTU2NjMwOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15663098?extsite=MTU2NjMwOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns related to this RFP, please contact Carlos Cabannes at [carlos.cabannes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carlos.cabannes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). Coppadatos 10. Last
